sections.summary:
Energetic and versatile professional seeking to utilize and expand existing retail management skills with a growth oriented company. Professional
Sales Manager with experience coordinating a wide range of business activities in fast-paced sales environment Self motivated and experienced in
prioritizing projects and achieving results Strong understanding of sales, merchandising and customer service strategies Strong communicator with
excellent work ethics and ability to continuously acquire new skills
Highlights
Established track record of exceptional sales results Energetic
Goal-oriented Excellent communication skills
Staff development/training Exceptional multi-tasker
Recruiting and interviewing Team-oriented
Accomplishments
Awarded â€œTop Sales Manager of the Yearâ€​ in 2010.
Exceeded Sales Management goals by 10+% on a quarterly basis, which led to promotion to District Sales Manager within 7 months.
Created strategies to grow customer base, which resulted in increased monthly sales.
Managed a successful sales team of 20+ members who consistently exceeded sales goals each month.
